website_summaries.verdict: Some alkaline waters only address the acidity issue, but we love how AQUAhydrate also brings electrolyte and mineral restoration to the table. The price point is a bit higher, but we like the flavor profile and the generous bottle size.
pros: High levels of electrolytes and minerals added for additional health benefits
Very smooth texture, easy to drink
Bottle is sturdy and BPA-free, making it good for travel
cons: Flavor and pH levels are variable, sometimes as low as 5
Some users compare it to regular tap water, with a slightly salty aftertaste

customer_reviews.title: ⚠️ Tap Water. Not Aqua Hydrate
customer_reviews.text: What happened? I thought that if I ordered this online, it would at least taste the same. Guessed wrong. It feels like they added tap water to this and it doesn't nearly taste the same as you would buy at GNC. Whenever I open the cap, it doesn’t make that click snappy noise. It seems like the opened it up. Very Very disappointed. Also got this tested at a pool store. Wasn't PH9+ It was PH6-7.
customer_reviews.author: Evan's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love the WATER but the bottles are now coming all ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the WATER but the bottles are now coming all dented making them very difficult to pour from. This has happened on the last TWO orders. Unless we are guaranteed undamaged product we will NOT being buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan White

customer_reviews.title: I have always enjoyed this product
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed this product, the taste was great, my whole family enjoyed it but the last order that we received tastes terrible, the water has a salty taste and just to be sure it wasn't me I had multiple people try it. I don't know what happened but we canceled our subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No Bad Tastes
customer_reviews.text: I'm having chemo treatments, and sometimes I have a hard time with the taste of water; and for me this doesn't have a processed taste. And if it's helping with my pH levels that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend. Bought these because I had a stomach problem with high acidity and wanted to see if the alcaline water helped my pain and body become more alcaline. I don't know if it scientifically did, but I felt better in a couple days and never again had a flare-up. This water is good, tastes good and makes you want to drink water, unlike my tap water. Absolutely recommend this. The 1.5 L bottles are the best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Studart

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cancer Patients
customer_reviews.text: This water is amazing. I first found it when my poppy had cancer and kept getting dehydrated, he didn't like Gatorade or Powerade so we had to find an alternative to electrolytes. This water he drank everyday and it kept him out of going to the hospital after chemo for getting dehydrated. Now I drink it while I work. I work out in the sun all day and it keeps me hydrated as well. It tastes good and unlike gatorade and powerade with all the sugars is so much more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K

customer_reviews.title: Taste like liquid PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: We where excited for this product....and Yuck...maybe this case was poorly treated...in excessive heat or something...It taste like liquid plastic. We drink Alkaline water, but this case we got...is gross. Badly handled or just the way this brand is made...yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra A.

customer_reviews.title: What's going on
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this product but lately the product has been showing up in poor quality. The waters that I received today look like they've been rolled around on the dirt floor and then put in a torn up box. I hope that this problem can be adjusted so that no one else has to receive the same surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, helps my electrolytes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this water. I follow a ketogenic diet and balancing electrolytes can be tricky in keto. I feel like this water helps, along with aloe and salting my food with Selina Naturally salt. The listing was wrong - for a case of 12 instead of a single bottle. I figured as much because of the price, so when I received 4 bottles instead of 4 cases, I gave the seller a heads up. And they refunded my purchase! I wasn't asking them to do that and I was surprised, but I thought it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi7002

customer_reviews.title: Improve Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I had Aquahydrate from the grocery, where I thought it tasted excellent, but this batch I bought has a bad aftertaste, and some of the bottles are all "off" in tasting like chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: sj

customer_reviews.title: what happened?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 24 pack of 16.9oz bottles. I have never had an issue with the product before and I think it is a great product. This was the 10th time I ordered this from amazon. My order arrived 18 DEC and it tasted terrible. It was comparable to drinking from a garden hose and having the rubber taste. The product normally just tastes a lot like spring water. I will not order this from Amazon again unless I see proof that the problem has been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: something is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this water for a long time from amazon. This last batch of 24 has a terrible taste to it. My son said something is wrong and I tasted it and sure enough it has a nasty chemical tap water taste. I will not be ordering it again. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: pug lover

customer_reviews.title: Fake water
customer_reviews.text: We bought pH strips and tested the water. Measured 6.5
customer_reviews.author: Prenthis Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Best served cold otherwise it has a flat taste
customer_reviews.text: Best served cold otherwise it has a flat taste. Tastes much better than the tap water in my City. Bottle fits in my cup holder so I can easily take it with me. Not sure if the PH is really beneficial, yet. Like that is has electrolytes without added taste or coloring, like Gatorade or other electrolyte drinks. Personally, not a big water drinker so trying something new to push me to drink it. Other reviews talked about debris in the bottle, mine was perfectly clear. Also other reviews talked about filthy bottles. The box was clean, so were the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Water Tastes Bad
customer_reviews.text: I used this water for over a year even though it cost more than others. It was refreshing and tasted good. My last order of two cases came and tasted awful-like chlorine or some other chemical. Amazon sent me two more cases....they taste the same. Now Amazon says these items are not eligible for return/refund so I guess I’m stuck with two nasty tasting cases if water. I hope they let the manufacturer know as I’m sure they would want to fix their water and not lose business.....too bad....they had a great product.....
customer_reviews.author: Denise Banks

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaper and more delicous to drink out of your neighbor's swimming pool
customer_reviews.text: Say something nice about AQUAhydrate: they picked a great name -- aqua means water in another languag and hydrate is what water should do. As for the bad.... I'm pretty sure there isn't water in these bottles and you can't force yourself to drink enough of the liquid to actually get hydrated. The contents of the bottle taste like sewage runoff from the Dasani factory (that's a highbrow water connoisseur joke). Besides the product itself being horrible, AQUAhydrate arrives in boxed that are falling apart and bottles are almost always dented and occasionally leaking. My dogs won't drink it or even let me bathe them with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco P

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I had this before and loved it. But I got a case of it recently that was terrible. The water has almost a burnt plastic taste to it. I tried a few bottles from different parts of the case and it’s the same. Even had someone else try it too. Unfortunately I have to throw the rest away and obviously won’t order again
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The water smells - this has never happened before
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have bought Aquahydrate on Amazon. I am so disappointed with the product for the very first time. As I was drinking it, a odd smell permeated from the bottle. Plastic? Not sure. The taste was even different. I will never order from Amazon again. Also the packaging from the shipping department was terrible. The box was not the usual stiff Amazon box.
customer_reviews.author: Maxeen

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first case I had of this water was just amazing. It was clean fresh and crisp tasting. I just received another case and it is just nasty. It taste like the water has been sitting in a plastic bottle in the sun all day. Very un-pleasant. I will need to toss this case out. It’s un-drinkable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gamber

customer_reviews.title: Good Water!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my daughter who has MS. It is good for her hydration and she needs the electrolytes. I do drink it myself and I feel more energetic. It is a very natural tasting water. Worth the cost, but not the shipping charges.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Crudup

customer_reviews.title: Chlorine taste for a year. Corporate office mot responding
customer_reviews.text: I drink this for Years here lately I have been tasting more chlorine it doesn't taste right anymore. Have been trying to contact The main office and they're not responding to me. This is big going off a 8 months I have left voice messages to the right department they do not return my calls so I no longer buy the water
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like water should.
customer_reviews.text: Most commercial bottled water has a taste, not always pleasant. After trying a number of brands, Aqua Hydrate was the one that had no noticeable taste, and seems to be consistently good. It's a little expensive, but worth the extra cost to me. It's become almost impossible to find in local grocery and drug stores, but the on-line price is comparable to retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: FresnoDick

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong, not the same!
customer_reviews.text: Some is wrong, IDK if it’s more counterfeit products on Amazon or failed QC/very poor quality control... but this taste like tap water. Does not taste like what I buy in stores, pH is not the same either. Very upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong water
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive Aqua hydrate water. Instead I received essential overachieving h2o water which does not have a good taste at all compared to Aqua water.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong with this water from this seller. I complained about the first shipMent and they spent a replacement with no problem. I buy this water all the time but neither shipment tasted right. It had a strange taste. I will cancel my reoccurring shipment
customer_reviews.author: Oyster Bay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I can not find this water in any of my local stores anymore. Thankfully I can still order it here! I have Lupus a long with a few other conditions. I always feel dehydrated especially in hot humid weather. This water has tasted better than any other brands. My 19 yr old son has drank this water during work outs and basketball games for years. I will continue to keep buying cases.
customer_reviews.author: justee1

customer_reviews.title: Love this water - always want it on hand.
customer_reviews.text: Love this water best out of many others. Not sure why exactly - and I was thinking I should do a blind taste test with the other kinds available....But for the past several months - this water helps me to feel better and I love the taste. Fiji water is the only thing close in taste (both really good), but I find that AQUAhydrate does more for my overall hydration, especially while working out or on hot days...or whenever not hydrated enough. Drinking this overnight and before my coffee in the AM does wonders for me...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Tasting
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting water ever!! I don't know the Benefit's but I do know it tastes good and is good for my son and husband who are both diabetic. I'm happy with the Subscription on Amazon the price is good. I get it once a month although it doesn't last that long :0) eventually I will invest in a purifier until then I'll keep orders coming
customer_reviews.author: GorgeousMa

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this instead of my regular water because it was on sale. Big mistake. It tasted like chlorine filtered water. Not as acidic as it claims to be. Definitely will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette K. Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Last order tasted like bottled city tap water
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked this water but the last order of it tasted like bottled city tap water. Very strong orders and tastes of plastic/chemicals. I will not buy it again. Its expensive water to start with and then you receive some unsatisfactory water. I'm not sure what's going on but it now has me skeptical to buy it again. I recommend if anyone buys it, open a bottle that day and check it out. I waited too long and missed the return date, so that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Some of the water bottles had a Very Bad After Taste!
customer_reviews.author: GrandK

customer_reviews.title: REBOTTLED TAP WATER
customer_reviews.text: bought at the beginning of lockdown. unfortunately the only water I could find. honestly been meaning to complain for a hot minute. never even finished the case, it's DISGUSTING. this is straight up tap water. tastes awful. bottles weren't filled consistently, some had more some less. some weren't even fully sealed and leaked all over. immediately reminded me of that scene from slumdog millionaire where the kids are refilled water bottles from the tap then gluing the lids shut. AWFUL monsters to charge these prices for unsanitary water. some of us have health conditions and don't need your slummy ass selling us tainted water.
customer_reviews.author: Christin P.

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Water I can drink!
customer_reviews.text: I used to only drink about 4-5 gallons of pure water (not diluted with tea or Gatorade) a year. This water has improved my life soooo much. I now drink a 1-2 Liters A DAY. I started drinking Aquahydrate about a year ago now and I haven’t stopped- just recently learned you can buy it on amazon. Go Amazon! If you have a hard time drinking water- try this- there is no weird “water” flavor. Those who can relate will know what I mean. Lol I actually enjoy drinking Aquahydrate all day long. :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't quite taste right 😕
customer_reviews.text: Both packages tasted like it came out of a water hose, not its normal taste. It had too of sat in the heat too long or been old, something was off it was gross. As we gave to a friend that literally liked the way water tasted from the hose. Lol. Reminded him of back when he was a kid😬🥴.
customer_reviews.author: SAnn

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe there was an issue with my order, but my family and I do not like the taste-like chlorine. Anyway also tried Essentia and Flow Alkaline water. I liked both of those but Flow a little better and liked the container better. I was not paid to write this nor was I given any for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know why the bottle states a ph of 9 when it is clearly the same as plain bottled water! Do not buy these lies!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Heim

customer_reviews.title: Tap Water - Not high pH water
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I was supporting this product for a good while but most recently I had subscribed to get this 24 pack on a monthly basis, my first order came in. I realized quite quickly that some of the bottles of water did not taste the same. I even had a couple of friends over who had the water - they all said the same, that it tasted like tap water in this product. I tasted the same thing days before. I would highly advise that you stay away from this water not sure what else could be wrong with it. Very disappointed and will be switching to a different pH water in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BThomas

customer_reviews.title: Tap Water?
customer_reviews.text: I normally just drink aquahydrate and the order I received this week tastes like tap water. The package came dented, and the bottles had dust on them. Cancelling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: klee22

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Hydrate??
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been consuming Aqua Hydrate for years. I’ve never bought it from Amazon though. When the case arrived, a couple of bottles had leaked in transit, so I thought. But now, after drinking a few bottles, I’m questioning if the product is authentic. There is an aftertaste I have not ever experienced before. I watered my plants with over 1/2 the case that I had left.
customer_reviews.author: lulu21

customer_reviews.title: Bottles were warped when they were delivered
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I love the size and the price of the bottles. This is the third time that the box has arrived where every single bottle is warped at the top and bottom of the bottle. The top of the bottle is squished into it and this makes it hard to open and drink out of. The bottom of the bottle sticks out that the bottle isn't able to stand on a flat surface without it spilling.
customer_reviews.author: funinthesun

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in this shipment
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this shipment. As a massage therapist I have been promoting this product & giving a bottle to each client. As the small bottles are hard to find I decided to order through Amazon. This is not the same water.. after taste of a mold taste & my clients have commented on this .. not worth shipping back as half of case is gone before realizing the bad taste. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: The last shipment the water had a bad taste as if it was not the usual water ...I could not finish drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: my last two cases of water taste different
customer_reviews.text: Loved this water up until the last two cases. Not sure what happened or changed; and its not just me everyone in my family noticed a change in the taste of this water. I was subscribed monthly but just cancelled my subscriptions. I sent a note directly to Aquahydrate but have not received a response.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Been drinking Aquahydrate for 7 years and definitely tell that it helps with hydration and recovery after training. Hadn’t been a fan of drinking plain water before, but the taste and refreshing feeling is a game changer. The 1.5 liter size is a better cost too
customer_reviews.author: 500MPL

customer_reviews.title: Something in the water
customer_reviews.text: I had to cancel my subscription for this water because on my last two shipments the water had a taste like too much sodium chloride in it...this water is normally great however, something is going on with wherever you are getting this water from. I went to GNC just to make sure and their water was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Just got a call from my Mom and she said the water tastes like bottled tap water. .it tastes disgusting in her words. She said my Dad wouldnt drink it either. Very irritating and wont purchase again
customer_reviews.author: D White

customer_reviews.title: started good ended bad
customer_reviews.text: We had a subscription for a few years. The water quality was great, tasted great too. Then every other shipment the water quality was bad. Tasted like plastic, like it was sitting in the sun and the plastic leached into the water. We got a few replacements that were fine. But My last 2 shipments tasted like plastic and now even the replacement for them taste like plastic. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: taste like left over pool water
customer_reviews.text: taste like left over pool water. has a chlorine taste. I have had 6 people try this water and none would take a second sip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Graham

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Horrible this is not real Aquahydrate!!
customer_reviews.text: This batch of Aquahydrate tasted horrible, had a bad aftertaste, I have been drinking this water for a long time and know that it does not normally taste this way, it tasted worse than tap water. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: FAKE/has to be Refilled with TAP WATER
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before and it tasted great...but this last order literally tastes like tap water from a small down with old lines!! It’s awful....clearly someone is refilling these with tap water and trying to pass them off as the real deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Switchbladecrystal

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product many times but received a new case today and it is tap water. It is definitely not the same product from past orders. I’m now seeing other people’s reviews saying the same thing. Not sure what happened but can’t order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: J-Law

customer_reviews.title: Great product poor!! handling during delivery
customer_reviews.text: The AquaHydrate water is excellent! Highly recommend to anyone. The handling during delivery is terrible this order arrive with one bottle thrown so hard that a bottle broke and several were dented. The broken bottle soaked the box with fell apart luckily the tape held it so what together. The dented bottle overflowed when open due the compression off the water from the dents
customer_reviews.author: John McLimans

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water
customer_reviews.text: One of my new favorite waters. I found this water while searching for pH waters. Very smooth and no after taste. A little on the expensive side though!
customer_reviews.author: sassyc

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from Acid Reflux and am on medication for it, a friend recommended drinking one or two bottles a day. I noticed the difference within a week. I hardly ever have the reflux at night any more. I talked with my doctor about this and he said it was ok to drink it, but to be sure to take my medication also. I would recommend it to anyone, but be sure to talk to your doctor first.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rouster

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water. Highly recommend buying over the store brands or Aquafina.
customer_reviews.author: TC Ham

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund on my credit card for Aqua Hydrate 9Ph plus 16.9 Fl. Oz. pack of 24.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 cases, both came but on different days. One case of water was not tasting good, it tasted like old water and not what Aqua Hydrate usually tastes like. I would like for you to refund me the cost of one case of 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 24). The other case that arrived a day later was perfect. Thank you, Robert Liggett's wife, Vicki Liggett
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Liggett, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: I love this water, however I received my 4th monthly delivery and this case of water had a really funky taste. Not sure what to do because it’s not worth the effort of returning because I’ve tasted funkiness almost a medicinal taste from 4 out of 5 bottles. I might need to cancel the monthly scheduled order.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Houghton

customer_reviews.title: What happened to this product???
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this water. I order it frequently. However, the last case I ordered had a strong chlorine taste. It was replaced with another case which I appreciated, but unfortunately it’s just as bad as the previous case. Not sure what is going on but I hope the problem gets fixed.🙁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasted like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Tasted terrible like plastic would never buy again. Love this water from local stores this just tasted old. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Skorupski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE AQUAhydrate!!!
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes amazing! I can't ever go back to drinking regular water after tasting AQUAhydrate alkaline water. I always had a hard time drinking water but not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs better shipping packaging.
customer_reviews.text: We love this water, my husband swears by it working in the heat all day. Every time we have received our subscribe and save order there are leaking bottles in it. They really need to ship it differently. This last order had two completely empty bottles in it.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: I like this water.
customer_reviews.text: I like this water. Family members recommended that I drink this water after a recent hospitalization. Based on what I've read and my experience thus far, I believe the higher alkalinity has health benefits, but I'm not an expert. I have bought this water several times since December and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K

customer_reviews.title: Water tastes different each time
customer_reviews.text: Several were leaking. Not a good month. I will definitely unsubscribe from this product
customer_reviews.author: mary jane seay

customer_reviews.title: Garden Hose taste
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this water many times and love it but this batch tastes different as if it came out of a hot garden hose. Yuck! What happened?
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good taste.
customer_reviews.text: I will have to switch brands because this alkaline water tastes like chlorine. My order that came in November was horrible so I figured it was a bad batch. However, my order for December was still bad . So I’m switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: lashaun chatmon

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I might be nuts but this water had a faintly salty taste.. I settled the problem of which alkaline water by purchasing an almalizing pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: sue williams

customer_reviews.title: This water is fantastic. After kayaking all day in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This water is fantastic. After kayaking all day in the sun, this is making me feel hydrated after one bottle. I will be purchasing more of this water! Very pleased!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper fan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell and aftertastes
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the big bottles and never had any problems with them.. this order has a terrible smell and after taste... something was definitely wrong
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Sant

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste cannot drink
customer_reviews.text: Very bad taste tried a few bottles. Taste like plastic or chemical. Will be returning! Wrote email to company and no response. Poor customer service. The government should test thus ester. Something wrong with it. Make sure you are near a bathroom after drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Water Snob
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I love this water. It tastes so crisp and clean. I have drunk all types of waters, Including having a water softener in my home with reverse osmosis water, and this by far is the only water that tastes as RO should taste. No trace of any after tastes or minerals. Hands down, I will continue to buy, it's worth every penny and with "prime" you can't beat not paying shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weingardt

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm always searching for ways to improve my health and deal with my digestive issues. This water has been a great addition. I love the smooth and hydrating feel it has in your mouth and the clean crisp taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting high pH water in a bottle designed to fit my trucks cupholder.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ainslie

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love the water but every month lately I've had to deal with bottles leaking during shipment. Too much money to have to deal with this mess month after month. I just canceled my subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order.. I was very disappointed this order because the moment you opened a bottle it had an awful smell. It smells like rubber or water hose. It tastes disgusting!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canceled subscription
customer_reviews.text: On my second case and really trying to like the taste but to me it tastes just like the tap water here in Florida. As a result, I am sticking to Smart Water which I know from purification testing is 100% pure and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark1021

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: i enjoy this water and my body can tell the difference from other brands. The delivery was not so kind the box was damaged and I could have lost some bottles, but all were accounted for.
customer_reviews.author: D Michele

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Flavoring
customer_reviews.text: This water Honestly tastes like plastic. I would not recommend it to anyone. I’ve read other reviews stating the same thing, but figured I’d still give it a try. NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Diana J.

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste-changed formula
customer_reviews.text: This water used to taste good. Now it tastes far worse than tapwater. I don’t know what happened but they have messed up. I’ll be looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting water by far! Felt so good after drinking a bottle. Will order each month that is for sure...
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting water, sturdy bottle, great price if looking at alkaline water. I will keep buying and would defiantly recommend if your debating.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Allison

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Terrible tasting water at any temperature. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: AntonioMarc

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste Tastes like rusty pipes or from a garden hose
customer_reviews.text: Awful taste Tastes like rusty pipes or from a garden hose!
customer_reviews.author: Garry B.

customer_reviews.title: Only trace electrolytes!
customer_reviews.text: Advertised that it has electrolytes, but only trace amounts. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Z. Fox

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE- NOT REAL H2O.  HORRIBLE AFTERTASTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible aftertaste! I’ve been purchasing this water for years!!! I’ve always ordered the 1 liters. They’re awesome. This time I went for the 16oz bottles are they are not real AquaHydrate water. This tastes like tap water with salt! I want a refund!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Aquahydrate only brand we drink
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Kirkland water, Arrowhead, Dasani, Costco Alkaline and it doesn't compare to Aquahydrate quality. My kids drink more water ever since I did the switch to AQUAhydrate. Bottle quality is heavier than other typical water bottles. This is good at keeping us hydrated as my kids don't have a hard time drinking coz it tastes great and no after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water but not handled properly
customer_reviews.text: This is my second box and I looks like it feel off the back of a truck and picked back up
customer_reviews.author: Terresha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Electrolyte & PH9 akaline sold Me , not to mention It's tasteless & clear
customer_reviews.author: jadedoerA

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Was a lil worried when I seen other reviews. Wish it was cheaper is my only complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine L. Schwalb

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like pool water..
customer_reviews.text: This water has a VERY weird taste. It almost tastes like pool water..I bought three cases and all three cases tasted the same. Which I would have saved my money and bought a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This taste horrible. Taste exactly like tap water!! Please refund!
customer_reviews.author: Magic Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best for my body and skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Danny wood of nkotb lives by this water, so I tried it. Best tasting alkaline water ever!! Delicious and I never tire of drinking it- my skin is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good water
customer_reviews.text: I love the water. Feel bad for the ups/mail delivery. Some bottles were empty from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Real alkaline water
customer_reviews.text: Love the product water was excellent didn’t have any junk in it and actually gives you energy
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Drammeh

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Prevents me from getting a headache when doing Orange Theory Fitness. Plain water doesn’t do a thing and I leave class with a pounding headache! Not with this water!
customer_reviews.author: Master of the Universe

customer_reviews.title: Often are delivered smashed
customer_reviews.text: These often or arrive smashed But the water is really delicious and I like the style and size of the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie L.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the bottle
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I loved the bottle! It easy to hold, and it's strong. It doesn't crush easily. I love the flavor, it just tastes clean. I really can't tell if it has more ph or anything, but I do like it. Best bottled water I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Orr

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand, hard to find size, delivered to my door. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzette Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna be honest... The price hurts my pockets, but clean and pure water, equals life👍
customer_reviews.author: Leonides Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Aquahydrate is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other Alkaline bottled water before but Aquahydrate is by far the best I ever had. My kids love it too because it does not have any after taste and so refreshing especially at this time of the year. I am able to make them drink more water because they like the taste of Aquahydrate.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Great water
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend referred me to this water and he loves it. It has a slight taste to me but nothing that keeps me from drinking.
customer_reviews.author: J Castillo

product_meta.title: AQUAhydrate Electrolyte Enhanced Water Ph9+, 33.8 Fl. Oz (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Size:33.8 Fl Oz (Pack of 12)PERFORMANCE IN THE PUREST FORM. AQUAhydrate is pure, great tasting water that fuels your performance lifestyle. With 2x more electrolytes than the leading electrolyte-enhanced water and an elevated alkaline pH level, AQUAhydrate helps to balance and restore hydration levels during performance without any sugar or calories. Break the mold and live in the new generation of hydration. Through a proprietary process, AQUAhydrate water is purified to some of the most rigorous standards in the industry, supplemented with electrolytes and natural trace minerals and then raised to an alkaline pH of over 9 using electrolysis. It is this powerful synergy between the alkalinity process and our all-natural electrolytes that gives AQUAhydrate a crisp refreshing taste. AQUAhydrate has become the water of choice for professional athletes, sports teams, health and nutrition authorities and our everyday warriors. AQUAhydrate is proud to have Sean "Diddy" Combs and Mark Wahlberg as active investors and fans of the water.
feature_bullets: AQUAhydrate is pure great tasting bottled water
A proprietary electrolyte blend provides 2X more electrolytes than leading electrolyte-enhanced waters
An alkaline pH of 9+ helps balance and restore hydration
1L is our largest bottle and great for all-day hydration

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item can only be shipped to the 48 contiguous states and to APO/FPO/DPO addresses. For APO/FPO/DPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
